tasks.title: React UI Shell & State Management
tasks.description: Create main layout, device list, session view, logs panel. Add Redux/Zustand for app state.

tasks.title: mDNS Discovery Browser
tasks.description: Discover Agents via bonjour-service and show deviceId, hostname, IP, agentPort, and lastHeartbeat.

tasks.title: Manual IP Connect Fallback
tasks.description: Allow entering IP:port to connect when mDNS discovery fails or is blocked.

tasks.title: PSK Management UI
tasks.description: Import/export PSK, bind PSK to trusted deviceIds, and persist securely on the Viewer machine.

tasks.title: WSS Signaling Client
tasks.description: Connect to Agent over WSS, perform challenge-response auth, and maintain session state with retries.

tasks.title: WebRTC Offer/Answer (Viewer-side)
tasks.description: Create offer, process answer, and establish simple-peer connection with bandwidth/fps constraints.

tasks.title: Render Live Stream & Audio Playback
tasks.description: Attach remote tracks to video/audio elements, full-screen toggle, pause/resume, and snapshot button.

tasks.title: Receive & Store Screenshots
tasks.description: Persist screenshots under screenshots/{deviceId}/{yyyy}/{MM}/{dd}/{timestamp}.jpg with metadata DB (SQLite).

tasks.title: Screenshot Browser & Search
tasks.description: Filter by deviceId/date range, preview grid, open in viewer, and export selection (zip).

tasks.title: Retention Policy & Cleanup
tasks.description: Scheduled job to purge screenshots and logs older than retentionDays; compact SQLite DB.

tasks.title: Multi-Agent Sessions
tasks.description: Support concurrent live sessions from multiple Agents with a grid/tile layout and mute/volume per tile.

tasks.title: Session Logs & Audit View
tasks.description: Display session start/stop, screenshot receipts, errors. Export logs to CSV/JSON.

tasks.title: Performance Metrics
tasks.description: Show FPS, bitrate, packet loss, and round-trip time per session. Warn on degraded quality.

tasks.title: Electron Builder Config
tasks.description: Configure electron-builder for Agent (service install) and Viewer, code signing optional, free distribution.

tasks.title: Windows Service Script
tasks.description: Add post-install script to install/uninstall Agent as a Windows service (node-windows).

tasks.title: Firewall & Defender Guidelines
tasks.description: Document netsh rules creation and Defender exclusions needed during installation (manual steps).

tasks.title: Installer Builds (.exe)
tasks.description: Generate Windows installers for Agent and Viewer. Verify silent install flags and uninstallers.

tasks.title: LAN E2E Test Matrix
tasks.description: Test across different Wi-Fi routers/VLANs, with/without mDNS, manual IP fallback, and multiple concurrent Agents.

tasks.title: Load & Duration Tests
tasks.description: Sustain 2â€“4 live sessions for 2 hours; verify stability, memory usage, and screenshot delivery cadence.

tasks.title: Documentation & Ops Runbook
tasks.description: Write admin setup guide, backup/restore of screenshots/SQLite, PSK rotation procedure, and troubleshooting.
